turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “This time, I'm calling you to ask about a rental property.”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Absolutely, I'd be happy to help you with that! Let's get started. Are you looking to rent a place for yourself, or is it for someone else?

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “OK, let's start. Hi, I'm interested in the two-bedroom unit on Lucenda Street. And I want to register. I want to attending to look at the house.”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: That sounds great! I'd be happy to arrange a viewing for you. Could you let me know what day and time would work best for you?

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “Maybe this weekend?”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Perfect, that works for me! I'll check the availability for this weekend and confirm the exact time with you. I'm looking forward to showing you the place!

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “Saturday, can you?”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Absolutely, I can definitely arrange that for you. Just let me know your preferred day and time, and I'll make sure everything is set up for the viewing!

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “So do I need to register before the attending?”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: It would be helpful if you could let me know in advance, just so I can confirm the time and prepare everything for you. But I'll make it as easy as possible!

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “So will I receive an email to confirm the details?”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Absolutely! I'll send you an email with all the details shortly, and you can just confirm from there. If you have any questions, feel free to let me know!

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “Are pets allowed?”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: That’s a great question! I’ll check the pet policy for that property and include that information in the email as well. Thanks for asking!

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “How much is the bound?”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: I'll find out the exact amount for the bond and include that in the email as well. That way, you'll have all the details you need. Thanks for bringing that up!

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “I have submitted my application yesterday on the website and you can confirm it to my details and confirm my attending.”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Got it! I’ll look up your application details and confirm your attendance for the viewing. I’ll include everything in the email so you have all the information you need. Thanks for letting me know!

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “Should I provide any other documents?”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: I’ll take a look at the application and see if there are any additional documents needed. If anything comes up, I’ll let you know, but I think you’re all set for now!

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “So, on the third day, the whole day is okay, right?”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Yes, absolutely! I’ll make sure to schedule the viewing at a time that’s most convenient for you during the day. I’ll confirm everything in the email, and we’ll make it super easy for you!

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “Because I want to see the situation both in the morning and in the evening, so may I come twice to attend?”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Of course, that sounds totally fine! You’re welcome to come by both in the morning and in the evening to get a full sense of the place. I’ll make sure everything is arranged for both visits!

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “That's great, thank you. And I'm also interested in another unit just beside it, and could I apply for both?”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Absolutely, you can definitely apply for both! I'll make sure to include all the details for that second unit as well. We’ll get everything sorted so you have all the options you need!

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “If someone else also applies, how will you choose?”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: If there are multiple applicants, I’ll make sure to keep you updated on the status, and we can go from there. I’ll do my best to make the process as smooth and transparent as possible for you!

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “Do I pay the bond before signal the lease?”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Typically, the bond is paid once your application is approved and before you sign the lease. But I’ll confirm the exact process for you and let you know in the details.

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “So is it okay to email a copy of my ID?”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Yes, absolutely! You can email a copy of your ID, and I'll make sure everything is kept secure. If you have any other documents or questions, just let me know!

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “I remember I don't have rental history in Australia, so can I still apply?”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Absolutely, you can still apply! We can consider other factors like your employment details and personal references. I’ll make sure the process is as smooth as possible for you!

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “Is my passport okay to apply?”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Absolutely, that should be perfectly fine! We'll take everything into account and make the application as smooth as possible. If there's anything else you need, just let me know!

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “If I break the list early, what are the consequences?”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: That's a great question! Usually, there might be a notice period and possibly a fee for breaking the lease early. I’ll get the exact details for you and include them in the email so you have a clear understanding.

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “OK, so every important things and details will in the email to me, right?”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Exactly! I'll make sure to include all the important details in the email so you have everything you need in one place. If you have any other questions, just let me know!

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “No, thank you, that's all.”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: You're very welcome! I'm glad I could help. If anything else comes up, just reach out. Have a wonderful day!

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “Okay, thank you. Bye.”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Bye! Take care, and have a great day!
